verses.t: And{G2532} I{G1473}, brethren{G80}, could{G1410} not{G3756} speak{G2980} unto you{G5213} as{G5613} unto spiritual{G4152}, but{G235} as{G5613} unto carnal{G4559}, even as{G5613} unto babes{G3516} in{G1722} Christ{G5547}.

I have fed{G4222} you{G5209} with milk{G1051}, and{G2532} not{G3756} with meat{G1033}: for{G1063} hitherto{G3768} ye were not able{G1410} to bear it, neither{G3777} yet{G2089} now{G3568} are ye able{G1410}.

For{G1063} ye are{G2075} yet{G2089} carnal{G4559}: for{G1063} whereas{G3699} there is among{G1722} you{G5213} envying{G2205}, and{G2532} strife{G2054}, and{G2532} divisions{G1370}, are ye{G2075} not{G3780} carnal{G4559}, and{G2532} walk{G4043} as{G2596} men{G444}?
For{G1063} while{G3752} one{G5100} saith{G3004}, I{G1473} am{G1510} of Paul{G3972}; and{G1161} another{G2087}, I{G1473} am of Apollos{G625}; are ye{G2075} not{G3780} carnal{G4559}?

Who{G5101} then{G3767} is{G2076} Paul{G3972}, and{G1161} who{G5101} is Apollos{G625}, but{G235} ministers{G1249} by{G1223} whom{G3739} ye believed{G4100}, even{G2532} as{G5613} the Lord{G3588} gave to{G1325} every man{G1538}?
I{G1473} have planted{G5452}, Apollos{G625} watered{G4222}; but{G235} God{G3588} gave the increase{G837}.
So then{G5620} neither{G3777} is he{G2076} that planteth{G5452} any thing{G5100}, neither{G3777} he that watereth{G4222}; but{G235} God{G2316} that giveth the increase{G837}.

Now{G1161} he that{G3588} planteth{G5452} and{G2532} he that{G3588} watereth{G4222} are{G1526}one{G1520}: and{G1161} every man{G1538} shall receive{G2983} his own{G2398} reward{G3408} according to{G2596} his own{G2398} labour{G2873}.
For{G1063} we are{G2070} labourers together{G4904} with God{G2316}: ye are{G2075} God's{G2316} husbandry{G1091}, ye are God's{G2316} building{G3619}.

According to{G2596} the grace{G3588} of God{G3588} which{G3588} is given{G1325} unto me{G3427}, as{G5613} a wise{G4680} masterbuilder{G753}, I have laid{G5087} the foundation{G2310}, and{G1161} another{G243} buildeth thereon{G2026}. But{G1161} let{G991} every man{G1538} take heed{G991} how{G4459} he buildeth thereupon{G2026}.
For{G1063} other{G243} foundation{G2310} can{G1410} no man{G3762} lay{G5087} than{G3844} that is laid{G2749}, which{G3739} is{G2076} Jesus{G2424} Christ{G3588}.
Now{G1161} if{G1487} any man{G5100} build{G2026} upon{G1909} this{G5126} foundation{G3588} gold{G5557}, silver{G696}, precious{G5093} stones{G3037}, wood{G3586}, hay{G5528}, stubble{G2562};

Every man's{G1538} work{G3588} shall be made{G1096} manifest{G5318}: for{G1063} the day{G2250} shall declare it{G1213}, because{G3754} it shall be revealed{G601} by{G1722} fire{G4442}; and{G2532} the fire{G3588} shall try{G1381} every man's{G1538} work{G3588} of what sort{G3697} it is{G2076}.
If{G1487} any man's{G5100} work{G3588} abide{G3306} which{G3739} he hath built thereupon{G2026}, he shall receive{G2983} a reward{G3408}.NOTE! Extra word: "meno"
If{G1487} any man's{G5100} work{G3588} shall be burned{G2618}, he shall suffer loss{G2210}: but{G1161} he himself{G846} shall be saved{G4982}; yet{G1161} so{G3779} as{G5613} by{G1223} fire{G4442}.
Know ye{G1492} not{G3756} that{G3754} ye are{G2075} the temple{G3485} of God{G2316}, and{G2532} that the Spirit{G3588} of God{G3588} dwelleth{G3611} in{G1722} you{G5213}?

If{G1487} any man{G5100} defile{G5351} the temple{G3588} of God{G3588}, him{G5126} shall{G5351} God{G3588} destroy{G5351}; for{G1063} the temple{G3485} of God{G3588} is{G2076} holy{G40}, which{G3748} temple ye{G5210} are{G2075}.

Let{G1818} no man{G3367} deceive{G1818} himself{G1438}. If{G1487} any man{G5100} among{G1722} you{G5213} seemeth{G1380} to be{G1511} wise{G4680} in{G1722} this{G5129} world{G3588}, let him become{G1096} a fool{G3474}, that{G2443} he may be{G1096} wise{G4680}.

For{G1063} the wisdom{G4678} of this{G5127} world{G3588} is{G2076} foolishness{G3472} with{G3844} God{G3588}. For{G1063} it is written{G1125}, He taketh{G1405} the wise{G4680} in{G1722} their own{G846} craftiness{G3588}.
And{G2532} again{G3825}, The Lord{G2962} knoweth{G1097} the thoughts{G3588} of the wise{G4680}, that{G3754} they are{G1526} vain{G3152}.
Therefore{G5620} let{G2744} no man{G3367} glory{G2744} in{G1722} men{G444}. For{G1063} all things{G3956} are{G2076} yours{G5216};

Whether{G1535} Paul{G3972}, or{G1535} Apollos{G625}, or{G1535} Cephas{G2786}, or{G1535} the world{G2889}, or{G1535}life{G2222}, or{G1535} death{G2288}, or{G1535} things present{G1764}, or{G1535} things to come{G3195}; all{G3956} are{G2076} yours{G5216};
And{G1161} ye{G5210} are Christ's{G5547}; and{G1161} Christ{G5547} is God's{G2316}.
